# SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint.search

**Case**

A task that uses captured speech to specify search terms.

## Declaration

```swift
case search
```

## Discussion

Use this hint type when you are using speech recognition to identify search terms.

## Hints

- **SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint.unspecified**: An unspecified type of task.
- **SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint.dictation**: A task that uses captured speech for text entry.
- **SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint.confirmation**: A task that uses captured speech for short, confirmation-style requests.
